extension.dc:title: Invasive Species Pathways
extension.name: Pathway
extension.dc:subject: dwc:Taxon checklist
extension.dc:description: DwC Taxon extension to exchange invasive species pathways.

property.name: datasetID
property.dc:description: An identifier for data provider. Should be a unique acronym or other identifier.

property.name: pathway
property.dc:description: The pathway, given as a URI

property.name: description
property.dc:description: Any descriptive free text explaining the pathway.

property.name: source
property.dc:description: Source reference of this pathway, a URL or full publication citation
